statements: DELETE FROM flood_forecast WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM flood_forecast WHERE date = '2022-12-31' AND flood_likelihood >= 0.8;
DELETE FROM flood_forecast WHERE date='2023-09-15' AND location='City A';
DELETE FROM flood_forecast WHERE flood_likelihood>=0.7 AND estimated_losses<500000;
DELETE FROM flood_occurrences WHERE id = 1 AND severity > 5
DELETE FROM estimated_losses WHERE cause = 'Heavy Rain';
DELETE FROM estimated_losses WHERE location = 'New York' AND cause = 'Heavy Rainfall';
